snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Monday's selections include items on the growing numbers of patents being granted to women and a case for the growth of Hadoop into a major...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Monday's selections include items on the growing numbers of patents being granted to women and a case for the growth of Hadoop into a major force for handling Big Data.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Soaring E-Book Prices and Pinterest Photos
